name: retro-terminal
description: Throwback retro CRT style layout with a terminal.
author: Brandon Helms

scripts.build:dev: npm run copy-src && npm run sass
scripts.start:dev: nodemon --watch src --ext '*' --exec 'npm run build:dev' & http-server dist -p 8888 -c no-store
scripts.build:prod: npm run copy-src && npm run sass && npm run minify:html
scripts.predeploy: npm run build:prod && mkdir -p release && cp -R dist/* release/
scripts.deploy: gh-pages -d release --dotfiles --message 'Deploy to GitHub Pages [skip ci]' --repo https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/${REPOSITORY}.git
